synopsis.text: Seventeen-year-old high school student Hirosuke Nakaido leads an ordinary life until the day he encounters the strikingly beautiful Yasuna Ajimu at the train station. He is instantly smitten, but their awkward first meeting leaves uncertainties. As Hirosuke gets to know Yasuna, they become friends, yet he struggles to confess his true feelings. Complications soon emerge as Yasuna remains haunted by her mysterious past relationship. While trying to support her, Hirosuke discovers there is more to her story than she has revealed. As obstacles arise in their budding romance, Hirosuke determines to stay by Yasuna's side. Through patient understanding and courage to overcome challenges, the two slowly open up to each other. With determination and compassion, their friendship blossoms into an emotional bond. This anime chronicles the transformative power of love at first sight, and the hard-won trust between two young souls finding their way.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
